alert.note: Alert for Banner; Box Butte; Morrill; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 5:24PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A line of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Box Butte, eastern Scotts Bluff, northern Morrill, northeastern Banner and southeastern Sioux Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 423 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake Minatare Campground, or 8 miles east of Scottsbluff, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Scottsbluff, Alliance, Gering, Bayard, Terrytown, Minatare, Lake Minatare Campground, Chimney Rock State Park, Angora, Kilpatrick Lake, Moomaws Corner, Scottsbluff Airport, Lake Minatare, The Intersection Of Highway 385 And L62, South Bayard Junction, Lake Alice, Melbeta and McGrew. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Banner; Box Butte; Morrill; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux
